ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( SPARTADMS__Document__r.SPARTADMS__Version_Status__c , 'Approved'), ISPICKVAL( SPARTADMS__Document__r.SPARTADMS__Version_Status__c , 'Effective'), ISPICKVAL( SPARTADMS__Document__r.SPARTADMS__Version_Status__c , 'Obsolete'), ISCHANGED( SPARTADMS__Document__c ) ), ISCHANGED( SPARTADMS__Deactivated__c ) )
